pp-intro: At kpucha.dev, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide through our website.

pp-contents.info-we-collect: We collect personal information from users who visit our website, such as their name, email address, and postal address. We may also collect tracking information, such as your IP address, browser type, preferred language, pages visited, and the date and time of your visit.
pp-contents.how-use-info: We use the personal information we collect to provide you with personalized content and improve your experience on our website. We may also use your information to send you newsletters, promotions, and special offers related to our products and services.
pp-contents.sharing-info: We will not share your personal information with third parties without your prior consent, except in cases where the law requires it or where necessary to protect our rights or property.
pp-contents.cookies: We use cookies on our website to track your activity and personalize your online experience. Cookies are small files that are stored on your device and allow us to identify your browser and remember your preferences. We may also use third-party cookies, such as Google Analytics, to collect information about your activity on our website for analysis and advertising purposes.
pp-contents.info-sec: We take reasonable security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure. However, we cannot guarantee that your information is completely secure due to the inherent nature of the Internet.
pp-contents.updates: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time and without prior notice. You will be notified of any significant changes to our privacy policy by posting the revised policy on our website.
pp-contents.user-rights: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. You may also opt-out of receiving promotional emails in the future by following the instructions in the email.
pp-contents.contact: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us through our contact form on our website.
pp-contents.law: This privacy policy is governed by the laws of Spain, and any disputes arising from it will be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the International Commercial Arbitration Rules of Spain.
